answers.author: Mark Abeles-Allison
answers.text:
Lots of things to consider.  The basic definition of independent contractor as provided by the IRS and State agencies is the first consideration.  Newer considerations should include the Affordable Care Act and the Affordability and Offering provisions going into effect in 2015.   State law changes regarding pensions may make contracting less advantageous.

author: April Getchius
text:
Hi, all.  My planning, engineering and department heads are contract employees.  We are rapidly growing and I am evaluating if it is time to hire as I think staff is having trouble keeping up.  Any advice on how to evaluate the cost/benefits of hiring vs. Contracting?
Thanks so much.
title: Contract vs. hiring employees
